SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.color

Class SimpleColor

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.color.SimpleColor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Color8, Packable
public class SimpleColor extends Object implements Color8
A simple immutable color, which is not easy to manipulate. This class is designed for spacial efficiency.

This implementation has 8 bits of precision for both storage and output.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleColor

      public SimpleColor(int rgba)
      Creates a new color by assigning the raw RGBA value. For the encoding format, see Color8.packRGBA(int, int, int, int).

      Note that this does not use the same encoding as standard RGB hex codes.

      Parameters:
      rgba - The raw RGBA value of this color
      See Also:
      • Color8.packRGBA(int, int, int, int)
      • Color8.unpackRed(int)
      • Color8.unpackGreen(int)
      • Color8.unpackBlue(int)
      • Color8.unpackAlpha(int)

    • SimpleColor

      public SimpleColor(int r, int g, int b, int a)
      Creates a new color. All components must be within the range of 0-255.
      Parameters:
      r - The red component of this color
      g - The green component of this color
      b - The blue component of this color
      a - The alpha component of this color

    • SimpleColor

      public SimpleColor(@Nonnull Color8 c)
      Creates a new color.
      Parameters:
      c - The color of which to copy component values from

  • Method Details

    • fromHex

      @Nonnull public static SimpleColor fromHex(int hex)
      Creates a color from an RGB hex code. The alpha component will be 255. (opaque)
      Parameters:
      hex - The RGB hex code
      Returns:
      The converted color

      Creates a color from an RGB hex code.
      Parameters:
      hex - The RGB hex code
      alpha - The alpha component value
      Returns:
      The converted color

    • pack

      public long pack()
      Packs this color into a long. This is only implemented to respect the contract of Color8, and packing this color into a long will only increase its size.
      Specified by:
      pack in interface Packable
      Returns:
      The long representation of this color

    • rgba

      public int rgba()
      Encodes this color into 32 bits which contain the RGBA component values.
      Specified by:
      rgba in interface Color8
      Returns:
      The RGBA components of this color packed into 32 bits
      See Also:
      • Color8.packRGBA(int, int, int, int)

    • equals

      public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj)
      Checks for equality between this color and the provided object obj.

      Same instances of colors will be compared to their full storage precision. For example, two instances of LinearColor will only be considered equal when all double components are equal in accordance to the == operator.

      Between different instances, colors are considered equal when the 8 bit representation is equal, regardless of the internal precision of the implementation.

      Specified by:
      equals in interface Color8
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare to
      Returns:
      true if the object is also a color, and the RGBA components are equal

    • parseColor

      @Nonnull public static SimpleColor parseColor(@Nonnull String input) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deserializes a string into a color.
      Parameters:
      input - The string to parse
      Returns:
      The parsed string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the format is invalid
